languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, высший офицерский состав выражает скорбь в связи с трагической гибелью Главного технопровидца в ходе экспедиции. Каковы будут дальнейшие распоряжения касательно корабля "Герметико"?"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, высший офицерский состав выражает скорбь в связи с трагической гибелью Главного технопровидца в ходе экспедиции. Каковы будут дальнейшие распоряжения касательно корабля "Герметико"?"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the High Enginseer during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们的首席引擎先知在探索过程中不行遇难，所有高级军官都致以深切的哀悼。关于隐士之舟号，我们接下来该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们的首席引擎先知在探索过程中不行遇难，所有高级军官都致以深切的哀悼。关于隐士之舟号，我们接下来该怎么办？”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, les officiers supérieurs déplorent la perte tragique du technaugure primus au cours de l'expédition. Quels seront vos ordres concernant l'Hermetico ? »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, les officiers supérieurs déplorent la perte tragique du technaugure primus au cours de l'expédition. Quels seront vos ordres concernant l'Hermetico ? »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, los oficiales superiores lamentan la trágica pérdida del visioingeniero primero durante la expedición. ¿Qué desea hacer con la Hermetico?».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, los oficiales superiores lamentan la trágica pérdida del visioingeniero primero durante la expedición. ¿Qué desea hacer con la Hermetico?».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「陛下、上級士官たちは遠征中の機関整備師主任の悲劇的な死を悼んでいます。ヘルメティコに関する今後の命令はいかがいたしますか？」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、上級士官たちは遠征中の機関整備師主任の悲劇的な死を悼んでいます。ヘルメティコに関する今後の命令はいかがいたしますか？」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die höheren Offiziere trauern, dass der Maschinenseher Primus während der Expedition auf tragische Weise umgekommen ist. Wie lautet Eure weiteren Befehle bezüglich der Hermetico?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die höheren Offiziere trauern, dass der Maschinenseher Primus während der Expedition auf tragische Weise umgekommen ist. Wie lautet Eure weiteren Befehle bezüglich der Hermetico?"
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Kıdemli subaylar, yolculuk esnasında yitirdiğimiz Başmühedyum'un yasını tutuyorlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hermetico'yla ilgili emirleriniz nedir?"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the senior officers mourn the tragic loss of the Enginseer Prime during the expedition. What will be the subsequent orders regarding the Hermetico?"
